languages.text: "Инквизиция? {name}, вы не говорили, что изволите водить дружбу с такими... выдающимися слугами Императора. Полагаю, надо отличиться, чтобы заслужить столь высокое и пристальное внимание!" {n}Джай издает смешок.{/n}

"The Inquisition? {name}, you never mentioned you socialised with such... distinguished servants of the Emperor. I'll bet it takes someone truly remarkable to warrant such eminent and close attention!" {n}Jae lets out a laugh.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Инквизиция? {name}, вы не говорили, что изволите водить дружбу с такими... выдающимися слугами Императора. Полагаю, надо отличиться, чтобы заслужить столь высокое и пристальное внимание!" {n}Джай издает смешок.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The Inquisition? {name}, you never mentioned you socialised with such... distinguished servants of the Emperor. I'll bet it takes someone truly remarkable to warrant such eminent and close attention!" {n}Jae lets out a laugh.{/n}

"The Inquisition? {name}, you never mentioned you socialised with such... distinguished servants of the Emperor. I'll bet it takes someone truly remarkable to warrant such eminent and close attention!" {n}Jae lets out a laugh.{/n}

languages.text: 「異端審問庁？{name}、そのような…皇帝に仕える高貴な方々と付き合ってるなんて、一言も聞いてない。これほど注目されるには、よほど特別な存在でなければ無理よね！」{n}ジェイは思わず笑った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition? {name}, you never mentioned you socialised with such... distinguished servants of the Emperor. I'll bet it takes someone truly remarkable to warrant such eminent and close attention!" {n}Jae lets out a laugh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「異端審問庁？{name}、そのような…皇帝に仕える高貴な方々と付き合ってるなんて、一言も聞いてない。これほど注目されるには、よほど特別な存在でなければ無理よね！」{n}ジェイは思わず笑った。{/n}

languages.text: “审判庭？{name}，你从来没提过你与……帝皇如此尊贵的仆人有来往。我敢打赌，只有真正了不起的伟人，才能得到如此崇高、如此密切的关注！”{n}婕伊大笑起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition? {name}, you never mentioned you socialised with such... distinguished servants of the Emperor. I'll bet it takes someone truly remarkable to warrant such eminent and close attention!" {n}Jae lets out a laugh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “审判庭？{name}，你从来没提过你与……帝皇如此尊贵的仆人有来往。我敢打赌，只有真正了不起的伟人，才能得到如此崇高、如此密切的关注！”{n}婕伊大笑起来。{/n}

languages.text: «¿La Inquisición? {name}, nunca has comentado que hayas tratado con ese hatajo de... distinguidos siervos del Emperador. ¡Habrá que ser muy ilustre para recibir una atención tan eminente y directa!». {n}Jae deja escapar una carcajada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition? {name}, you never mentioned you socialised with such... distinguished servants of the Emperor. I'll bet it takes someone truly remarkable to warrant such eminent and close attention!" {n}Jae lets out a laugh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿La Inquisición? {name}, nunca has comentado que hayas tratado con ese hatajo de... distinguidos siervos del Emperador. ¡Habrá que ser muy ilustre para recibir una atención tan eminente y directa!». {n}Jae deja escapar una carcajada.{/n}

languages.text: « L'Inquisition ? {name}, vous ne m'aviez pas dit que vous fréquentiez des serviteurs aussi... éminents de l'Empereur. Il faut vraiment se distinguer plus que quiconque pour mériter une attention aussi rapprochée et remarquable, je parie ! » {n}Jae éclate de rire.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition? {name}, you never mentioned you socialised with such... distinguished servants of the Emperor. I'll bet it takes someone truly remarkable to warrant such eminent and close attention!" {n}Jae lets out a laugh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « L'Inquisition ? {name}, vous ne m'aviez pas dit que vous fréquentiez des serviteurs aussi... éminents de l'Empereur. Il faut vraiment se distinguer plus que quiconque pour mériter une attention aussi rapprochée et remarquable, je parie ! » {n}Jae éclate de rire.{/n}

languages.text: "Die Inquisition? {name}, Ihr habt nie erwähnt, dass Ihr mit derlei ... angesehenen Dienern des Imperators verkehrt. Ich wette, man muss schon wirklich bemerkenswert sein, damit einem so viel Aufmerksamkeit zuteil wird!" {n}Jae lacht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition? {name}, you never mentioned you socialised with such... distinguished servants of the Emperor. I'll bet it takes someone truly remarkable to warrant such eminent and close attention!" {n}Jae lets out a laugh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Inquisition? {name}, Ihr habt nie erwähnt, dass Ihr mit derlei ... angesehenen Dienern des Imperators verkehrt. Ich wette, man muss schon wirklich bemerkenswert sein, damit einem so viel Aufmerksamkeit zuteil wird!" {n}Jae lacht.{/n}

languages.text: "Engizisyon mu? İmparator'un böylesine... Saygın hizmetkârlarıyla ahbaplığın olduğundan bahsetmemiştin {name}. Bu denli yüce ve yakın bir alakaya yalnızca özel kişiler mazhar olur, her kula nasip olmaz!" {n}Jae bir kahkaha patlatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Inquisition? {name}, you never mentioned you socialised with such... distinguished servants of the Emperor. I'll bet it takes someone truly remarkable to warrant such eminent and close attention!" {n}Jae lets out a laugh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Engizisyon mu? İmparator'un böylesine saygın hizmetkârlarıyla iletişim hâlinde olduğundan hiç bahsetmemiştin {name}. Böylesine yüce ve yakın bir ilgiyi hak etmek için gerçekten mükemmel biri olman gerekir!" {n}Jae kahkaha atıyor.{/n}
